name: Anomalies (Pre Alpha Version)
description:
This is the start of a dive into the life of an SCP Foundation member. 

You start as a new recruit at the Foundation and quickly get tasked with helping out other members with simple tasks. How hard can it be?

Note this project is a prototype at the moment and is not a full game. More work will be put into it after this and any feedback will help with the development and direction of the project.
